Text:
Cheers mate! Big fan and a lot of fucking respect to you!

For all of you who somehow have been able to ellude this handsome fella' I suggest you check youtube!

And for those who is truly wondering if he's for real, lemme tell you this: He is foh Realz!

I'll grab this for now; but when I'm not too shattered to read my card number I'll buy the songs too! Much respect for what you're doing dude- not only are you awesomely talented you've got the right attitude!

That said; any chance of some more open letters? :D

this guy is going places.
he's original, delivers on point, is completely relevant and pisses on the right people. 
keep it up man
Dan Bull is probably one the artists I respect most, he writes good, relevant music. I would buy your music Dan, but I am lackamoney right now. Keep on fighting the good fight man.
keep up the good work dan!!
the questions danbull...would you sign with a record conglomerate? Is tpb a stepping stone on your way to main stream?
gave your music a listen, and i enjoyed it.  yours is the first music i have purchased in ages.  thank you
Thank God for people like you.

SOPA Cabana = one of the greatest protest songs.

Cheers, for thinking different than the most of the artists out there.

If you are lazy and want to buy all the songs in one go:

http://www.amazon.co.uk/lm/R1KNKQ6WUQMPH1/

@graingert
What, so you get the money and it doesn't count towards Dan's sales count? No thanks.
